quoteText: All of our rights and obligations under our Privacy Policy are freely assignable by us to any of our affiliates, in connection with a merger, acquisition, restructuring, or sale of assets, or by operation of law or otherwise, and we may transfer your information to any of our affiliates, successor entities, or new owner.
title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
